data.content:
Look at the photographs of three seasons.
Choose your favourite season. Talk about why you like it.
Discuss with your partner and write a dialogue for the chosen option.

content.name: What I like to do in summer.
content.modelAnsTranscript: What do you like to do in summer?</br>I like to have ice-cream in summer.
content.instructions:
